item.description:
Hi!

If you're just learning about LOA or still can't quite figure out how to consciously attract what you want in your life, join us! Bring your questions and an open mind. This meeting is great for those who feel like they are just getting started or are not consistent in attracting what they put out there.

We will meet from 10:00am-11:30pm. I will have a meetup sign on our table. Call my cell phone if you don't see us.

Panera is in a small plaza of shops after Kelly's, next to Marshalls and across the street from Target off the the Lynn Fells Pkwy. It is on the South side of Route 1.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
617-678-5061

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Introduction to LOA Discussions
